00002 import sys
00003 sys.path.append('plurk_oauth/')
00004 from PlurkAPI import PlurkAPI
00005 import getopt
00006 import json
00007 
00008 def usage():
00009     print '''Help Information:
00010     -h: Show help information
00011     '''
00012 
00013 if __name__ == '__main__':
00014     try:
00015         opts, args = getopt.getopt(sys.argv[1:], "ho:v", ["help", "output="])
00016     except getopt.GetoptError, err:
00017         print str(err) # will print something like "option -a not recognized"
00018         usage()
00019         sys.exit(2)
00020     file = open('API.keys', 'r+')
00021     data = json.load(file)
00022     plurk = PlurkAPI(data["CONSUMER_KEY"], data["CONSUMER_SECRET"])
00023     if data.get('ACCESS_TOKEN'):
00024         plurk.authorize(data["ACCESS_TOKEN"],data["ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET"])
00025     else:
00026         plurk.authorize()
00027         data["ACCESS_TOKEN"] = plurk._oauth.oauth_token['oauth_token']
00028         data["ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET"] = plurk._oauth.oauth_token['oauth_token_secret']
00029         json.dump(data,file)
00030 
00031     content = '中文測試 OAuth API'
00032     if len(sys.argv) > 1:  
00033         content = sys.argv[1]
00034     qualifier = 'says'
00035     if len(sys.argv) > 2:  
00036         qualifier = sys.argv[2]
00037     print plurk.callAPI('/APP/Timeline/plurkAdd', {
00038         'content': content,
00039         'qualifier': qualifier } )
